meanings.definition: A sum of money paid out.
meanings.sent1: The payout for the job was fair.
meanings.sent2: She received a large payout for winning the lottery.
meanings.sent3: The payout from the fundraiser helped the charity immensely.
meanings.sent4: The company's generous payout was a pleasant surprise.
meanings.sent5: The payout gleamed in the sunlight, a symbol of hard work.

meanings.definition: The act of paying out money.
meanings.sent2: The payout process was smooth and efficient.
meanings.sent3: His exaggerated payout dance made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The payout flowed like a river, never-ending.
meanings.sent5: The loud sound of the payout echoed through the room.

meanings.sent1: They will payout the winnings tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: She decided to payout her savings to help a friend.
meanings.sent3: The magician will payout the prize to the lucky audience member.
meanings.sent4: The company will payout bonuses to all employees.
meanings.sent5: He carefully payout the coins into her hand, smiling.
